      org.xlattice.NodeID distance(org.xlattice.NodeID other) 
      int index(org.xlattice.NodeID id) 
      int logDistance(org.xlattice.NodeID other)
      Base-2 logarithm of the distance between this node and another, which is the same as the index of the KBucket that the other node would fall into.

      • logDistance

        public int logDistance(org.xlattice.NodeID other)
        Base-2 logarithm of the distance between this node and another, which is the same as the index of the KBucket that the other node would fall into.
